Articles.Content: I have the Enhanced Edition on a PS4 slim, play with the radial preset, and do not have the DLC. There are several issues with the new update (3/28/19), my main complaint being that sun glare is gone and atmospheric heating on re-entry does not show unless you are zoomed in quite close. Is there any timeline for a fix on these? Are the devs aware of the problems and working on them? I've heard quite a bit of conflicting information around and I figured you folks would know one way or the other if there is a fix in the works. I don't mind a bit of a wait as the game still works but I would really love to see these things fixed!
